title: Sun-Dried Tomato and Rosemary Bread
directions: Layer in 2-lb. loaf cylinder and bake according to breadmaker directions.
Allow to cool about 15 minutes in the pan.
Remove from pan and butter top and sides to prevent crust hardening.
ingredients: ⅓ cup Bella Sun Luici sun-dried tomatoes, julienne-cut with Italian basil (do not use oil pack)
2 tbsp. Olivari Mediterranean olive oil or Crisco shortening
3 ¾ cups Gold Medal bread flour (NOT all-purpose flour)
1 ¼ tsp. Fleishmann's bread machine yeast
